game.name: Realm of the Mad God Exalt
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, 협동, 온라인 협동, 앱 내 구매, 통계
game.shortDescription: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the pixelated Realm of the Mad God! Join, an action-packed, free-to-play MMO bullet hell game. Discover a world with danger, challenges, and hidden treasures as you battle through waves of enemies. Team up with players and conquer dungeons to become a legend!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on an exhilarating journey into the pixelated Realm of the Mad God! Join, an action-packed, free-to-play MMO bullet hell game. Discover a world with danger, challenges, and hidden treasures as you battle through waves of enemies. Team up with players and conquer dungeons to become a legend!
game.developers: Wild Shadow Studios, Deca Live Operations GmbH

reviewHighlights.text: 재밌음. 컨텐츠가 많이 없어보이지만 차피 여러번 죽을테고 죽을때마다 처음부터 다시키워야되서 엔드컨텐츠 볼일은 많이 없음. 다시키우는 것도 계정레벨보상으로 캐릭터 칸 열리면 어느정도 완화됨. 창고로 능력치포션을 옳기면 금방이라.. 에초에 이 게임 캐릭터가 죽어야 펫을 성...
